channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- iDRAC Service Module (iSM)

item.title: CVE-2024-22428|2024-02-07T11:28:37.259Z -- dell -- idrac%20service%20module%20%28ism%29
item.description: Dell iDRAC Service Module, versions 5.2.0.0 and prior, contain an Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability.Â It may allow a local unprivileged user to escalate privileges and execute arbitrary code on the affected system. Dell recommends customers upgrade at the earliest opportunity.
